H0.text: what places are in the west midlands. Birmingham

H1.text: what places are in the west midlands. Coventry

H2.text: what places are in the west midlands. Wolverhampton

H3.text: what places are in the west midlands. Walsall

A4.text: The region has seven cities: Birmingham, Coventry, Hereford, Lichfield, Stoke-on-Trent, Wolverhampton and Worcester.

A5.text: The West Midlands conurbation (includes Birmingham, Wolverhampton, Solihull, Sutton Coldfield, Dudley, West Bromwich and Walsall.)

A6.text: Birmingham is located in the centre of the West Midlands region of England

A7.text: Birmingham's metropolitan area includes the city of Coventry and the towns of Nuneaton, Warwick and Leamington Spa to the east in Warwickshire
